description: Living in China and reporting on the country's pandemic travails for the last two and a half years, I thought I was already very familiar with its severe Covid policies. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Testing positive for Covid in 'zero-Covid' China
title_page: Testing positive for Covid in 'zero-Covid' China | The Straits Times
maintext:
Living in China and reporting on the country's pandemic travails for the last two and a half years, I thought I was already very familiar with its severe Covid policies.
Then in May, on my way back after my first visit to Singapore in two years, I tested positive for Covid-19 at Shanghai Pudong International Airport.
